name: Wolfgate
description:
A dark and terrible Demon Prince has emerged threatening to wipe out all who are not Demons. Fight through dungeons, solve puzzles, and defeat bosses until you are strong enough to defeat the Demon Prince. Explore the world, as you meet interesting and odd characters. Upgrade your capabilities by spending coin, and XP.
Are you ready to shed your mortal self and enter the 2D world of Wolfgate!

-Enemy Level Up
-Level Up
-Dodge and Attack
-New Game +
-Dungeons and Puzzles
-Epic Boss Fights
-Plot Twists
-Hidden Rooms
-Side Stories
-Update Support
World Dragon Gaming, keeping inspiration alive .
